Package controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Login Controller Class. This Class prompts the user to enter a username and password. This screen is set to the user's system default and will adjust for French. Displays user TimeZone and user Locale.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the implementation of the LoginController method. Connects key for text labels with language packages under Resource Bundle Nat for en and fr. Displays current TimeZone and current Locale.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - initialize
      resourceBundle - initialize.

    • GetCurrentTimeZoneLocale

      public void GetCurrentTimeZoneLocale()
      This is the Get Current Time Zone and Locale method. This method displays current TimeZone and current Locale.

    • loginSuccess

      public static void loginSuccess​(java.lang.String user)
      This is the User Log for Successful login attempts. This method produces a record of successful attempted logins, that are recorded in a .txt file named LoginShoot.txt.
      Parameters:
      user - user

    • loginFailed

      public static void loginFailed​(java.lang.String user)
      This is the User Log for Failed login attempts. This method produces a record of failed attempts at login, that are recorded in a .txt file named LoginShoot.txt.
      Parameters:
      user - user

    • appointmentAlert

      private void appointmentAlert()
      This is the Appointment Alert Method. This method alerts the user who has successfully logged in, that there are current appointments scheduled for that user, within 15 minutes of login time. Lamda expression is used to identify any appointment starting within the next 15 minutes from user local time.

    • createReminderList

      private void createReminderList()
      This is the Create Reminder List Method This method loads up the reminderlist Observable Array with data from the SQL DB that corresponds with the current user and their appointment start times, to be used with the appointments method to alert user of any upcoming appointments, within the next 15 minutes. Data is converted from UTC time to user system TimeZone.

    • signIn

      void signIn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the SignIn Button for the User Login. This method prompts the user to enter a username and password. If username and password are incorrect, alert message is activated and access is denied and a log is created of the failed attempt. If correct, user is prompted with alert message for upcoming appointments within 15 minutes of login time, and loaded to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - event
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
